title: Women’s Long Winter Parka – Fur Collar, Warm & Stylish (Plus Sizes Available)
body_html:
Stay cozy and chic this winter with our long parka jacket, featuring a plush fur collar and flattering slim fit. Designed for warmth and comfort, it’s perfect for cold weather while keeping your style on point. Available in a wide range of sizes, including plus sizes!

✅ Thick insulation for all-day warmth
✅ Elegant faux fur collar adds luxury and style
✅ Windproof and water-resistant fabric
✅ Slim-fit design flatters every figure
✅ Available in sizes S to 6XL
